title: Team Standup
summary: Team discussed progress on database migration completion and API integration layer work. Database migration successfully completed with all tests passing. API integration expected to be done by EOD. Discussed performance issues found in staging environment.
key_points: Database migration for legacy system completed successfully
All tests passed - ready for rollout next week
Performance issues detected in staging environment requiring investigation
Client feedback received - mostly positive on new UI
Security review pending from platform team
key_decisions: Proceed with database migration rollout next week
Add performance optimization to tech debt list
Address client feature requests in next sprint

action_items.task: Create task for performance issue investigation in staging environment
Coordinate with team on overall progress update
Wait for security review completion from platform team

next_steps: Sync with team tomorrow on overall progress
Investigate and resolve performance issues in staging
Complete security review for rollout approval
